mapper.sql: a.card_no AS cardNo, a.shop_id AS shopId, a.parent_card_id AS parentCardId, a.mobile, a.share_benefit AS shareBenefit, a.card_handle AS cardHandle, a.handle_personal_id AS handlePersonalId, a.user_name AS userName, a.out_card_no AS outCardNo, a.type, a.is_using AS isUsing, a.CustomerCode, a.sale_man_id AS saleManId, a.share_num AS shareNum, a.child_client_id AS childClientId, a.update_time AS updateTime, a.create_user_name AS createUserName, a.create_user_id AS createUserId, a.create_time AS createTime, a.flag, a.update_user_name AS updateUserName, a.update_user_id AS updateUserId, a.id
mapper.select:
SELECT (SELECT p.RelName FROM PersonnelInfo p WHERE a.sale_man_id = p.id) saleName, (SELECT p.RelName FROM PersonnelInfo p WHERE a.handle_personal_id = p.id) handleName, (SELECT f.card_no FROM fr_card f WHERE a.parent_card_id = f.id) parentCardNo,
FROM fr_child_card a

SELECT a.share_num AS shareNum,a.id,a.child_client_id AS childClientId,a.create_time AS createTime, (SELECT b.type FROM fr_card b WHERE b.id = a.parent_card_id) type, isNull((SELECT TOP 1 (c.order_amt) FROM fr_card_order_datail c WHERE c.client_id = a.child_client_id AND c.is_using = 1 AND c.card_id = a.id AND c.status !=2 AND c.audit_status !=2 AND c.CustomerCode = a.CustomerCode AND c.type = 2 ORDER BY c.create_time DESC),0)orderPrice, isNull((SELECT TOP 1 (c.order_amt) FROM fr_card_order_datail c WHERE c.client_id = a.child_client_id AND c.is_using = 1 AND c.card_id = a.id AND c.status !=2 AND c.audit_status !=2 AND c.CustomerCode = a.CustomerCode AND c.type = 1 ORDER BY c.create_time DESC),0)orderRightsNum FROM fr_child_card a WHERE a.is_using = 1 AND a.CustomerCode = #{CustomerCode} AND a.parent_card_id = #{parentCardId} AND a.type != 2
